name: Apple Pie
description: The apple tree (Malus pumila) is a deciduous tree in the rose family best known for its sweet, pomaceous fruit, the apple.

recipe.name: Apple Pie
instructions: Preheat the oven to 425°F (220°C).
In a large bowl, combine sliced apples, sugar, cinnamon, salt, and lemon juice. Let it sit for 15 minutes.
Stir in flour to coat the apple mixture evenly.
Roll out one pie crust and place it in a pie dish. Pour the apple mixture into the crust.
Roll out the second pie crust and place it over the apple mixture. Seal the edges and cut slits in the top crust for ventilation.
Bake for 40-45 minutes or until the crust is golden brown. Let it cool before serving.

name: Cilantro Salsa
description: Cilantro is an herb that is commonly used in various cuisines for its fresh and citrusy flavor.

recipe.name: Cilantro Salsa
ingredients: 2 cups of fresh cilantro leaves, chopped
1/2 cup of red onion, finely chopped
instructions: In a bowl, combine chopped cilantro, diced tomatoes, red onion, jalapeño, and garlic.
Add lime juice and season with salt and pepper. Mix well.
Refrigerate for at least 30 minutes before serving. Enjoy with tortilla chips or as a topping for your favorite dishes.

name: Tomato Soup
description: The tomato (Solanum lycopersicum) is a widely cultivated and consumed fruit, typically used as a vegetable in cooking.

recipe.name: Tomato Soup
instructions: In a large pot, sauté chopped onions and garlic until translucent.
Add diced tomatoes, sliced carrots, and vegetable broth. Bring to a boil.
Reduce heat, add sugar, salt, and pepper. Simmer for 20-25 minutes until vegetables are tender.
Use an immersion blender to puree the soup until smooth. Add heavy cream if desired.
Serve hot and enjoy!

name: Avocado Toast
description: The avocado (Persea americana) is a creamy fruit that is often used in a variety of dishes, known for its rich taste and nutritional benefits.

recipe.name: Avocado Toast
instructions: Toast the slices of bread until golden brown.
Spread the mashed avocado evenly on each slice of toast.
Season with salt, pepper, and red pepper flakes if desired.
Top with a poached or fried egg, sliced cherry tomatoes, and fresh cilantro if desired.
Serve immediately and enjoy!

name: Pear Salad
description: Pears (Pyrus communis) are sweet and juicy fruits commonly used in salads to add a refreshing flavor.

recipe.name: Pear Salad
instructions: In a large bowl, combine mixed salad greens, sliced pears, toasted walnuts, and crumbled blue cheese.
Drizzle balsamic vinaigrette dressing over the salad and toss gently to combine.
Serve immediately as a refreshing and tasty side dish or light meal.
